question: What are the 3 most recent questions asked by the user with the highest reputation?

// Step 1: Find the user with the highest reputation
MATCH (u:User)
WITH u
ORDER BY u.reputation DESC
LIMIT 1

// Step 2: Find the questions asked by this user
MATCH (u)-[:ASKED]->(q:Question)
WITH q
ORDER BY q.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 3

// Step 3: Return the details of the 3 most recent questions
RETURN q.title AS title, q.text AS text, q.link AS link, q.createdAt AS createdAt
